content: **size** one size **measurements** approx 96 x 210 cm / 38 x 83 **materials** 6 balls of friends kid silk col arctic blue 77 **hooks** crochet hook 4 mm g-6 **yarn quality** friends kid silk hobbii 72 % mohair 25 % silk 3 % wool 25 g / 0 9 oz = 200 m / 218 yds **gauge** 18 double_crochet x 11 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 note wash and dry your sample before making measurements **pattern information** this triangular crocheted shawl combines a simple filet pattern which is quick and easy to make with a unique lace design may soft moments not only add a touch of elegance to your wardrobe but also become a source of joy and inspiration with every stitch turning each moment of creation into something truly delightful **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish
